NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CONOY: We plan to build a structure in stationary orbit around <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> to study the discrepancy Spire has recently observed.
2
1
CONOY: Are there any suggestions for where a warp tower connected to this structure should be built?
3
2
PRIVET: There are already plans to build several warp towers on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> for the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project.</color> We should not build the tower there, as it could interfere with those plans.
4
2
SPIRE: I would suggest building the warp tower on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> for our convenience - but I fear constant meteor impacts could cause the tower's base to shift over time!
5
4
PRIVET: Even if its predictions are not always accurate, your model could inform us of a site least likely to be impacted by <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern,</color> Spire.
6
5
CONOY: Additionally, if we build the warp tower's base across several pieces of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow's</color> crust, that should also strengthen the tower's stability greatly!
7
5
PRIVET: If we pinpoint a site never struck by meteors using the model, a tower built at that site should be much safer from meteor impacts!
Workshop R3 8
